thread.section_title: HRS - Das Hotelportal Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von HRS - Das Hotelportal | www.hrs.de | 8 von 1489
thread.title: Richard Wilhelm
thread.title_full: HRS - Das Hotelportal bewertet von Richard Wilhelm

author: Richard Wilhelm
title: Richard Wilhelm
text:
Have used HRS for several years now; the site is very user friendlly and the ratings on the hotels have all been accurate - no surprises.
Super selection of hotel and the "Hot Deals" offer great value and extras.
Corporate account makes things even easier, no hassles with the right address on the invoices, simple to guarantee your room if you are arriving late and if your plans change the cancellation process is quick and painless.
Unlike some other booking web sites, if you do a search HRS does not keep sending you unwanted e-mails.
Only positives about HRS!
